info.title: Model
info.description: Model is a service for managing software models using diagram as code.

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: Name of DSL file

parameters.name: repo
parameters.description: Path to repository root

parameters.name: dir
parameters.description: Path to directory containing a model package

post.description: Save the SVG streamed in the request body
Update the DSL for the given package, compile it and return the corresponding JSON if successful

put.description: Create or update a component in the model
Create or update a container in the model
Create or update a person in the model

delete.description: Delete an existing person from the model

parameters.name: repo
parameters.description: Path to repository root

parameters.name: dir
parameters.description: Path to directory containing a model package

parameters.name: PersonName
parameters.description: Name of person to delete

delete.description: Delete an existing relationship from the model
